comment: * The Builder class used to construct {@link DisplayCaptureArgs}

methods.name: public DisplayCaptureArgs build()
methods.comment:
* Construct a new {@link LayerCaptureArgs} with the set parameters. The builder
             * remains valid.

methods.name: public Builder setDisplayToken(IBinder displayToken)
methods.comment: * The display to take the screenshot of.

methods.name: public Builder setSize(int width, int height)
methods.comment:
* Set the desired size of the returned buffer. The raw screen  will be  scaled down to
             * this size
             *
             * @param width  The desired width of the returned buffer. Caller may pass in 0 if no
             *               scaling is desired.
             * @param height The desired height of the returned buffer. Caller may pass in 0 if no
             *               scaling is desired.

methodNames: public Builder setSize(int width, int height)
